blazers.name: Damian Lillard
blazers.description: The leader of the team. Awarded rookie of the year his first season.

blazers.name: CJ McCollum
blazers.description: Came into his own during the 2015-16 season earning him a spot on the starting five.

blazers.name: Mo Harless
blazers.description: Awarded most improved player in the NBA is second season.  A shot creator and unbelievable ball handling skills.

blazers.name: Al Farouq Aminu
blazers.description: Please dont take the ball up court.  Great defense and atheltic abilities.

blazers.name: Jusuf Nurkic
blazers.description: His second season in the NBA is looking to have some serious all-star potential.  The Blazers are an entirely different team with him on the court.

blazers.name: Allen Crabbe
blazers.description: Knocks the light out of three-point shots.  Ideal sixth-man.

blazers.name: Evan Turner
blazers.description: Known for his play making, phenomenal ball handling skills, and killer defense.

blazers.name: Meyers Leanord
blazers.description: A center than can spread the floor with his shooting ability.  Great on the boards as well.

blazers.name: Ed Davis
blazers.description: A strong center, aggressive on the boards, and very much a team player.

blazers.name: Shabazz Napier
blazers.description: Speed, offense, defense, playmaking ... he does it all.

blazers.name: Noah Vonleh
blazers.description: Young, powerful, does the dirty work, coming into his own.  A powerful asset to the team.

blazers.name: Jake Layman
blazers.description: Just needs more time to mature, the tools are there.  Had a breakout game where he shot 4 threes late in the 4th quarter.  Fans remember, oh, they rememeber.
